## Public Member Functions

### cleanupHandleCasts() {#a38e9b77a3c8508ea8ff0ba1f5bf81eba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DXILOpLowering.cpp&#125;::OpLowerer::cleanupHandleCasts ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiloplowering-cpp/#l00199">199</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiloplowering-cpp">DXILOpLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createTmpHandleCast() {#a20984af5cec72ee012a2da67d7aa78e2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DXILOpLowering.cpp&#125;::OpLowerer::createTmpHandleCast (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a cast between a <code>target(&quot;dx&quot;)</code> type and <code>dx.types.Handle</code>, which is intended to be removed by the end of lowering.

This is used to allow lowering of ops which need to change their return or argument types in a piecemeal way - we can add the casts in to avoid updating all of the uses or defs, and by the end all of the casts will be redundant.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiloplowering-cpp/#l00192">192</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiloplowering-cpp">DXILOpLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### replaceFunction() {#a6feadb2c8399ea3ed92085701f618b51}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DXILOpLowering.cpp&#125;::OpLowerer::replaceFunction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">llvm::function&#95;ref</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI)&gt; ReplaceCall)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "nodiscard"]}>
Replace every call to <code>F</code> using <code>ReplaceCall</code>, and then erase <code>F</code>.

If there is an error replacing a call, we emit a diagnostic and return true.

### replaceResRetUses() {#a583a2a6c920de4695807c6ad35c5e35d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DXILOpLowering.cpp&#125;::OpLowerer::replaceResRetUses (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; Intrin, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; Op, bool HasCheckBit)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Replace uses of <code>Intrin</code> with the values in the <code>dx.ResRet</code> of <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a></code>.

Since we expect to be post-scalarization, make an effort to avoid vectors.

### OpBuilder {#a065d75654c8a6ccafb8222c7c28a4d36}
